Keyboard shortcuts for Adobe Photoshop

A visual cheat-sheet for the 283 keyboard shortcuts found in Adobe Photoshop

Original Reference Report Issue

Popular shortcuts

Free transform

  • Ctrl
  • T

Decrease brush size

  • [

Increase brush size

  • ]

Decrease brush hardness

  • Shift
  • [

Increase brush hardness

  • Shift
  • ]

Default foreground/background colors

  • D

Switch foreground/background colors

  • X

New layer via copy

  • Ctrl
  • J

New layer via cut

  • Ctrl
  • Shift
  • J

Cancel any modal dialog window (including the Start Workspace)

  • Esc

Select the first edit field of the tool bar

  • Enter

Navigate between fields

  • Tab

Navigate between fields in the opposite direction

  • Shift
  • Tab

Change cancel to reset

  • Alt

Invoke the search experience

  • Ctrl
  • F

Use function keys

  • F2

  • F3

Paste

  • F6

  • F7

  • F8

  • F9

Revert

  • F12

Fill

  • F5

  • Shift
  • F6

Inverse selection

  • Shift
  • F7

  • PgUp/PgDn

  • Shift
  • PgUp/PgDn

Move view to upper-left corner

  • Home

Move view to lower-right corner

  • End

Toggle layer mask on/off as rubylith (layer mask must be selected)

  • \

Graduated filter tool

  • ]/[

  • Shift
  • ]/[

  • Alt
  • =/-
